definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: My little brother always forgets to wash behind his ears.
sentences.chinese: 我的小弟弟老是忘记洗耳后根。

sentences.english: His face was badly clawed by his little brother.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸被小弟弟抓坏了。

sentences.english: The only thing they altered was the size of the penis.
sentences.chinese: 他们唯一改变的是小弟弟的尺寸。

sentences.english: Brother's little brother, "that" when you, can you bear?
sentences.chinese: 哥的小弟弟“那个”你的时候，你能不能受得了？

sentences.english: By now, he should already be anticipating the sensation of having your mouth on his penis.
sentences.chinese: 到这时候，他就会希望感觉到小弟弟在你的嘴里。

sentences.english: Jane made up stories to amuse her little brother .
sentences.chinese: 简编故事逗她的小弟弟。

sentences.english: Tie your lacy underwear around of the base of your guy’s penis.
sentences.chinese: 将你的蕾丝内裤系到你男朋友小弟弟的下部。

sentences.english: The penis is "kind of a barometer of the sympathetic nervous system," Montague says.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔古说小弟弟是“某种交感神经系统睛雨表”。

sentences.english: Don't is nasty to your little brother.
sentences.chinese: 别跟你小弟弟动坏心眼儿。

sentences.english: Say, to cut his sword smoke little brother.
sentences.chinese: 说罢，便抽刀欲切本人的小弟弟。

sentences.english: She longed for a little brother and probably would have been happy with more siblings.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有一个小弟弟，大概多几个姐妹会很开心吧。

sentences.english: The girl sympathized with her little brother who had hurt himself.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩同情她那把他自己弄伤了的小弟弟。

sentences.english: She's just a soppy girl, ' said her youngest brother.
sentences.chinese: ｀她呀，就是爱动感情，＇她小弟弟说道。

sentences.english: I want to commend my little brother to your care.
sentences.chinese: 我想把我的小弟弟交托给你照顾。

definition: erhua variant of 男孩[nan2 hai2]
queer uncle, referring to a young to middle-aged male pedophile (Internet slang)
mythological daughter of Fiery Emperor 炎帝[Yan2 di4] who turned into bird Jingwei 精衛|精卫[Jing1 wei4] after drowning
father's younger brother/uncle/Taiwan pr. [shu2 shu5]/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
